params.params: (uint256 amountIn,uint256 amountOutMinimum, address[] path, address tokenIn, address to, bool unwrap)
(uint256 amountIn,uint256 amountOutMinimum, address pool, address tokenIn, address to, bool unwrap)
The parameters necessary for the swap, encoded as ExactOutputSingleParams in calldata
The parameters necessary for the swap, encoded as ExactOutputSingleParams in calldata

multicall(bytes[]).details: The `msg.value` should not be trusted for any method callable from this function.

params.data: ABI-encoded params for each of the calls to make to this contract.

returns.results: The results from each of the calls passed in via `data`.

params.amount: Token amount to grant spending right over.
params.deadline: Termination for signed approval (UTC timestamp in seconds).
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature.

params.expiry: Termination for signed approval - UTC timestamp in seconds.
params.nonce: Token owner's nonce - increases at each call to {permit}.
params.r: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.s: Half of the ECDSA signature pair.
params.v: The recovery byte of the signature.

exactInput((address,uint256,uint256,addr.notice: Swaps token A to token B indirectly by using multiple hops.

exactInputSingle((address,uint256,uint25.notice: Swaps amountIn of one token for as much as possible of another token

exactOutput((address,uint256,uint256,add.notice: Swaps as little as possible of one token for `amountOut` of another token

exactOutputSingle((address,uint256,uint2.notice: Swaps as little as possible of one token for `amountOut` of another token

multicall(bytes[]).notice: Provides batch function calls for this contract and returns the data from all of them if they all succeed. Adapted from https://github.com/Uniswap/uniswap-v3-periphery/blob/main/contracts/base/Multicall.sol, License-Identifier: GPL-2.0-or-later.

permitThis(address,uint256,uint256,uint8.notice: Provides EIP-2612 signed approval for this contract to spend user tokens.

permitThisAllowed(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Provides DAI-derived signed approval for this contract to spend user tokens.

userdoc.notice: Router contract that helps in swapping across pools.
